title: Panel, 1925–35
medium:
Medium: silk; painted
Technique: velvet painted with liquid and heavy medium - almost impasto to cover pile.
description: Black haired woman in a green dress driving a chariot drawn by two black horses through a wooded landscape. Along the road is a blond woman in a yellow dress standing in an attitude of surprise. Flowering landscape in foreground, plain yellow sky on background behind trees.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 1925–35.Medium: silk; painted
Technique: velvet painted with liquid and heavy medium - almost impasto to cover pile.. 1971-78-1.
